author: Special Correspondent
text:
RELIGION

Vikasatarangini : Discourse on Gita, Mani Higher Secondary School, 6:30 p.m.

Rathina Vinayakar Temple: Special abishegam, DB Road, 8.30 a.m.

CULTURE

Sri Thyaga Brahma Gananjali: Music festival, Sri Venugopalaswamy Temple,

5:30 p.m.

GENERAL

Coimbatore People Welfare Association, Herbal Tree Growers Association and Akshayamani Publishers: Herbal, medical and traditional food exhibition, Government High School, Ganapathy 10 a.m.

Shree Coimbatore Gujurati Samaj: Free naturopathy camp, Mettuppalayam Road,

8 .a.m.

Krishna Academy of Human Behavioural Science: Foundation course on hypnotism, Pethi Naidu Auditorium, 10 a.m.

ICICI Prudential Mutual Fund and The Hindu BusinessLine: Investor Education initiative, Hotel Taj, Race Course Road,

6 p.m.

St. Joseph’s Matriculation Higher Secondary School: Celebrating Kalai Sangamam, 5 .p.m.

Sri Venkataeswara Group of Institutions: Programme on How to write and publish a research paper.

The Coimbatore Productivity Council: Programme on APQP implementation and PPAP guidelines for customer delight,

9:30 a.m.

Coimbatore Vizha - Kovai Foodies: Old Coimbatore Heritage –Food walk, Tamil Nadu Mercantile Bank building, Big Bazaar Street, 6 p.m.

Gem Hospital & Research Centre: Exhibition on women’s health, 9 a.m.

Karpagam College of Engineering: Conference on ‘Innovations and engineering and technology,’ 10 a.m.

Coimbatore Institute of Management and Technology: Reunion of 2001-03 Batch MBA students, 10 a.m.

KPR Institute of Engineering and Technology: ‘Enthusia 2016,’ 10 a.m.

The PSBB Millennium School: Annual day, 6:30 p.m.

Angappa College of Arts and Science: Consumer festival, 10.am.

Dr. P.G.V. Matriculation Higher Secondary School: Annual day, 5:30 p.m.

TIRUPUR

Butterfly Sneeze Media Private LTD: Young Writer’s Literary Awards-2015, results of Tamil Nadu Inter-School Creative Writing Competition, Century Foundation Matriculation Higher Secondary School,

11 a.m.
title: In Coimbatore Today
